name: Choice (itch) (StarDomain)
description:
Humans are always been lazy.

Ever trying to get to their goals as soon as possible, more often than not, using violence and imposing themself on others.

And what about you?

What will you choose to do?
____________________________________________________

Choice is a first person experience with multiple endings where you'll be put on the test to evaluate the idea of the human corruption.

Feel free to choose whatever you want.
